Summary: Orange lights in sky two sets of two one set joined or merged or went into cloud or here two remained
divs: Sighting DetailsWas on st rt 8 south in Boston heights area ohio seen thru my drivers window two sets of orange lights spaced apart two by two as I drove south I kept looking back they were still there in sky ne sky . One of the 4 merged or went onto cloud as it was raining . I never seen anything like if . It was nov 2. 2013 @ 950 pm I felt overwhelmed as I never believed such things. But was sure what I see was not normal lights . As I've driven that way many nights . I looked back as long as I could they remained as I headed out of sight .
